Class FractionException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              rosas.lou.FractionException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FractionException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

An Exception class by Lou Rosas. This Exception is thrown by any set of classes wishing to interface with the Fraction Object
